name: GameJam - Virtually Alive
description:
Made for Gdevelop's GameJam June 2022, but I spent so long on game design and graphics I did not get to complete more than 2 mini games. Thought I would upload as proof of concept anyways for feedback. I wanted to do minigames like Wario but add a different twist on it by not using typical pixel graphics and coming up with unique themed puzzles.

https://liluo.io/instant-builds/96442fe2-d3c7-498d-9913-9bf266bc52ed
